titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow section 1031 treatment for exchanges involving certain mutual ditch, reservoir, or irrigation company stock.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/6/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-free exchanges of shares in certain mutual ditch, reservoir, or irrigation companies.
